page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS - MOTORWAYS
page.content: The{Burtonwood Service Area}is frequently used as a meeting place for salesmen and a change over point for lorries. A survey conducted at the service area showed that most lorries use the{M.62}on a daily or weekly basis much of the traffic being fairly local. It is the excellent communications of the nearby {M.6, M.56}and{M.62 {Motorways,}together with main line train services and the availablity of 2{airports,}Liverpool and Manchester, that has attracted much{industry}to the{Warrington Newtown Area.
